sentences:
The Children of Violence is a series of five semi - autobiographical novels by British Nobel Prize in Literature - winner Doris Lessing : 
The series follows the life of the protagonist Martha Quest from adolescence until her death , which takes place in the future , in the year 1997 .
The first four novels are set during the 1930s and 1940s , in the former British colony of Southern Rhodesia , now Zimbabwe , in southern Africa , where Lessing lived from 1925 until 1949 .
The fifth work , The Four - Gated City , is a science fiction dystopia set in London , from the 1950s into a future where World War Three takes place .
